note.p: Daughter of Wyrley Birch and his wife Katherine Sarah Reynardson of West Wretham Hall, Norfolk. Married Robert Pryor (1812–89), barrister, in London in 1844. Mother of Marlborough Robert Pryor.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1489/509/34)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 May 2013)
Norfolk Church of England registers PD 487/3 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 November 2022)
Westminster Church of England parish registers STJ/PR/6/21 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 November 2022)
